attributes.action: To have more police patrols day and night on the streets of London
attributes.additional_details: Because the streets of London are not safe and we dont feel safe.
attributes.background: The Government to intruct and more police officers  so there will be more patrols by foot, helicopter or cars.

rejection.details:
Policing in the capital is the responsibility of the Mayor of London, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are concerned about the efficacy of the Metropolitan Police you could start a petition about this with the London Assembly: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
